00008 void EagleLogger_Delete(EagleLogger *logger)
00009 {
00010     if(NULL == logger) {
00011         return;
00012     }
00013     
00014     EagleLock_Delete(logger->logLock);
00015     EagleLoggerEvent_Delete(logger->lastEvent);
00016     EagleMemory_Free(logger);
00017 }
00018 
00019 EagleLogger* EagleLogger_New(FILE *out)
00020 {
00021     EagleLogger *logger = (EagleLogger*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleLogger_New.1", 1000);
00022     if(NULL == logger) {
00023         return NULL;
00024     }
00025     
00026     logger->totalMessages = 0;
00027     logger->logLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00028     logger->out = out;
00029     logger->lastEvent = NULL;
00030     
00031     return logger;
00032 }

00034 EagleLoggerEvent* EagleLogger_LastEvent()
00035 {
00036     return EagleLogger_lastEvent(EagleLogger_Get());
00037 }

00039 EagleLoggerEvent* EagleLogger_lastEvent(EagleLogger *logger)
00040 {
00041     if(NULL == logger) {
00042         return NULL;
00043     }
00044     return logger->lastEvent;
00045 }

00047 EagleLogger* EagleLogger_Get(void)
00048 {
00049     static EagleLogger *EagleLogger_Logger = NULL;
00050     static EagleLock *lock = NULL;
00051     
00052     /* this function must be synchronized */
00053     if(NULL == lock) {
00054         lock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00055     }
00056     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(lock);
00057     
00058     /* initialise if its not started */
00059     if(NULL == EagleLogger_Logger) {
00060         EagleLogger_Logger = EagleLogger_New(stderr);
00061     }
00062     
00063     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(lock);
00064     return EagleLogger_Logger;
00065 }
00066 
00067 EagleLoggerEvent* EagleLogger_log(EagleLogger* logger, EagleLoggerSeverity severity, char *message)
00068 {
00069     EagleLoggerEvent *event = EagleLoggerEvent_New(severity, message);
00070     EagleLogger_logEvent(logger, event);
00071     return event;
00072 }
00073 
00074 EagleLoggerEvent* EagleLogger_Log(EagleLoggerSeverity severity, char *message)
00075 {
00076     return EagleLogger_log(EagleLogger_Get(), severity, message);
00077 }
00078 
00079 void EagleLogger_logEvent(EagleLogger* logger, EagleLoggerEvent *event)
00080 {
00081     char *timestamp;
00082     
00083     if(NULL == logger) {
00084         return;
00085     }
00086     if(NULL == event) {
00087         return;
00088     }
00089     
00090     /* this function must be synchronized */
00091     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(logger->logLock);
00092     
00093     /* pretty time */
00094     timestamp = ctime(&event->when);
00095     timestamp[strlen(timestamp) - 1] = '\0';
00096     
00097     if(NULL != logger->out) {
00098         fprintf(logger->out, "%s: [%s] %s\n", timestamp, EagleLoggerSeverity_toString(event->severity), event->message);
00099     }
00100     ++logger->totalMessages;
00101     
00102     /* track most recent event */
00103     if(NULL != logger->lastEvent) {
00104         EagleLoggerEvent_Delete(logger->lastEvent);
00105     }
00106     logger->lastEvent = event;
00107     
00108     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(logger->logLock);
00109 }
00110 
00111 void EagleLogger_LogEvent(EagleLoggerEvent *event)
00112 {
00113     EagleLogger_logEvent(EagleLogger_Get(), event);
00114 }
